scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../database && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:admin
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:admin
